product_name: Alite Boa Lite Dog Harness - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Alite Boa Lite Dog Harness with storage pockets and super-comfortable fit will help your 4-legged friend do his part to carry the gear whether trotting a city sidewalk or hiking the backcountry. Built-in zippered pockets let your dog carry around daily essentials. Adjustable rip-and-stick straps let you fine-tune the fit. Includes a stealth waste-bag dispenser. Durable-yet-breathable materials offer quick-drying comfort. Closeout.
short_description: The Alite Boa Lite Dog Harness with storage pockets and super-comfortable fit will help your 4-legged friend do his part to carry the gear whether trotting a city sidewalk or hiking the backcountry.
